title: How Filmmakers Manipulate Our Emotions Using Color
text:
How Filmmakers Manipulate Our Emotions Using Color 
Published By: Digg.com - Today 
Like music in an elevator or a doctor's waiting room, color has the power to influence how we feel without our even noticing. Film directors...
